values:
i still love you
i still want you
will you keep me?
after all
for better or for worse
sickness and health
till death do us part
after all

i still love you after all

I have made a resolution to practice positive thinking.  And in light of such = so far so good!  I wanna pop in the secret DVD before i go to sleep.  Maybe subconsciously it can melt itself further into my thinking.

Things I love about my hunbun:

- The most hilarious person I've ever known
- Simple, meat and potatoes type of guy
- Likes to just lay around and be lazy = probably won't drag me out to hike and stuff
- The most genuinely endearing laugh I've ever heard.  Something like a wheezing hyena
- His crooked teeth, chubby cheeks and crazy hair.
- The way he can interpret my numerous whines and grunts and gestures
- How he is ridiculously pale in the spots that are usually clothed.  It's hilarious
- He gives an awesome massage
- He gives awesome lots of other stuff
- He likes to eat and likes me to eat
- The way he wraps his arms around me while we walk even though it must be somewhat uncomfortable considering the height difference
- He supports my nailpolish obsession
- I've drooled on him on numerous occasions and he thinks its more cute than anything else
- He's a manly man in charge and its really really really attractive
- He's ticklish but in denial
- The stache, man.  Geez, how I love the mustache.  Please never ever ever take it off it's so sexy
- He initiates the snuggle session
- His snoring is endearing and not that bad
- His huge....eyes
- His huge....love of me

Power of positive thinking!  I feel so happy already

what is the secret to happiness?

i need to stop chasing the answer and just believe it already.

...not the greatest day ever i gotta say...its actually probably in my top 5 'worst days ever'.  

i am not really of delicate health.  i can run miles, chainsmoke cigarettes, go on spinning carnival rides, drink lots of beer and horrible science experiments of mixed drinks (tequila = doesnt really go well with a lot of things) and still be able to not lose my stomach.

so how is it that i can get spontaneously, physically, intensely sick to my stomach when i think of living my life without you.  so sick that i spend my entire first class with my head stuck in the toilet, losing my fucking gut.  and the rest of the day trying my best not to think of the whole damn business so i won't throw up again.  well i feel like i'm gonna throw up again.

you make this so much harder than it has to be.

and i do too. i'm sorry.

i wish i had some sort of html talent. sadly, i can only manipulate hex color codes and make stuff bold, italic, or underlined.

i am just about ready to pack my ass up and go home to my cozy little island. i do like it a lot here (= not hate it that much here) but i SRSLY ended up missing all of my jiggahboos at home. which is like 2 people. (but the BEST 2 people EVER) plus its cold and shit. somehow i came up here with 6 bottles of nail polish. and i will be coming back home with those 6...and like 17 more. well hey! some people like to collect stamps, or designer handbags, or gum wrappers. me, i collect nail polish. and by some great fortune of the gods i have ended up about to marry someone who not only tolerates it but actually ENCOURAGES it. squee. i love how he gets all invested in it. i know most guys would be like 'OMG WTF' (because guys talk in abbreviations) but not my hubby wubby. i am teh lucky.

i miss my bestest friend in the entire world. and she is probably the only one who would end up reading this. (or IS she? dun dun dun) which probably is a good time to stop talking about her in the third person. anyway, steffy, you are the macaroni to my cheese, the tabasco to my pizza,(well I like it. you like that bold action? its html. i could make it underlined if i wanted to.) the jam to my jelly (they're kinda the same thing but that's okay. i didn't think you'd wanna be the PB. yeah me neither) i heart you so much that i wrote about you in my French essay. so it was like a French love letter. only that i didnt give it to you and i had to turn it in for a grade and our friendship came to mind seeing as the topic was...friendship. and i got an A. and probably not because of my ease with French grammar. if you catch my drift

THE END
i dont really enjoy all the reading that i have to do.  i mean i like to read but when i'm told to do it all of a sudden its not that fun anymore.
